entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Increasing cloudiness. High zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning in the evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm except 15 cm over northern sections. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
